examples.example: 无论你在哪，我都会一直牵挂着你。

translate.english: No matter where you are, I will always be concerned about you.

examples.example: 不论你在哪，快乐都会常伴你左右。

translate.english: No matter where you are, happiness will always be by your side.

examples.example: 无论你在哪，我相信你都能追逐到属于自己的梦想。

translate.english: Wherever you are, I believe you can pursue your own dream.
